components.description: The letter M in a circle, commonly used in to identify a Metro (subway, underground train) station in a city area.
components.title: Circled Latin Capital Letter M

description: The letter M in a circle, commonly used in to identify a Metro (subway, underground train) station in a city area.
title: Circled Latin Capital Letter M

version.description:
Unicode 1.1 were pre-dated emoji inclusion in Unicode by 17 years, and included many characters primarily sourced from the Zapf Dingbats font.

The following characters were added to Unicode in 1993 and many were given emoji presentation status in the years 2010-2015.

emoji_net_data.definition: The letter M in a circle, commonly used in to identify a Metro (subway, underground train) station in a city area. Circled M was approved as http://emojipedia.org/circled-latin-capital-letter-m/
emoji_net_data.name: circled M

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the circled M emoji is a bold, graphic symbol rendered with a clean, impactful presence, featuring smooth, consistent color and sharp, yet subtly rounded edges. Apple's design ensures this symbol stands out clearly, representing a musical selection or a marking for a specific playlist or station. Its simplicity and directness on Apple devices make it instantly recognizable for referencing music or media.
